SELECT lg.masterloginno, lg.ip, lg.conndate, lg.masterno, mb.mastername, mb.masterid FROM masterlogin lg LEFT JOIN master mb ON lg.masterno = mb.masterno OR lg
WHERE (UPPER(lg.ip) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(lg.conndate) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(mb.mastername) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(mb.masterid) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%') AND lg.masterno != 0 ORDER BY lg.masterloginno DESC
